alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 08 at 5:00PM PDT until August 08 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR RIVERSIDE COUNTY... At 500 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Idyllwild-Pine Cove, Anza, Mt San Jacinto State Park, Hwy 243 Between Banning And Idyllwild, Mountain Center, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Hwy 74 Between Hemet And Mountain Center, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Whitewater, Valle Vista, Cabazon, Lake Hemet, Cahuilla Indian Reservation, Saboba Indian Reservation and Santa Rosa Mountain. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid flooded areas.
